document.full_text: the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom is the 2-1 morning-line favorite to become the 12th horse to win both the derby and the belmont stakes on saturday in the 143rd renewal of the triple crown's oldest and longest leg.
document.title: the rail: animal kingdom is the 2-1 favorite for the belmont
lines_and_colors: the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom is the 2-1 morning-line favorite to become the 12th horse to win both the derby and the belmont stakes on saturday in the 143rd renewal of the triple crown's oldest and longest leg.
